scripts.package: npm run build && npm prune --production && zip -r function.zip dist/ node_modules/ package.json && npm install
scripts.package:lite: npm run build && rm -rf node_modules && npm install --production && zip -r function.zip dist/ node_modules/ package.json && npm install
scripts.deploy: npm run package:lite && aws s3 cp function.zip s3://messageai-lambda-deployments/function.zip --region us-east-2 && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name messageai-service --s3-bucket messageai-lambda-deployments --s3-key function.zip --region us-east-2
